thread.title: I-9 Advantage - Announces Launch of Enhanced Automated Form I-9 And E-Verify Software At The Annual HR Technology Conference And Expo In Las Vegas
thread.title_full: I-9 Advantage - Announces Launch of Enhanced Automated Form I-9 And E-Verify Software At The Annual HR Technology Conference And Expo In Las Vegas - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: I-9 Advantage - Announces Launch of Enhanced Automated Form I-9 And E-Verify Software At The Annual HR Technology Conference And Expo In Las Vegas
text:
I-9 Advantage
DETROIT , Oct. 12, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- I-9 Advantage, the leading provider of automated Form I-9 and E-Verify® management software, announces it will reveal new enhancements to its product suite at the Annual HR Technology Conference in Las Vegas from October 18, 2015 to October 21, 2015 at booth 1301.
The enhancements include new improvements for I-9 Medic™ , an award winning cloud-based platform for digitally converting and correcting historical paper I-9s. I-9 Medic utilizes comprehensive proprietary algorithms and validation tools to precisely error check the Form I-9. This easy to-use solution also provides compliant step-by-step correction guidance to amend mistakes and omissions, as well as validate critical data. I-9 Medic has saved numerous organizations tens of millions of dollars in potential fines and penalties from Form I-9 related audits.
Organizations focused on creating new compliant forms should also consider the impact and liability of their historical paper forms, which have been shown to carry an error rate of sixty-eight percent. I-9 Medic helps companies avoid the risks of non-compliance due to errors and omissions contained in existing paper Form I-9s. Non-compliant forms that have been filed away, place companies across the U.S. in danger of receiving hefty fines of up to $1,100 per form.
Enhanced features will also be released for I-9 Remote™, a mobile-enabled platform for remote hiring. I-9 Remote allows anyone hiring remotely to complete the Form I-9 from any location. Utilizing I-9 Remote with I-9 Advantage's automated Authorized Agent platform eliminates the logistical hassles, reduces processing times, and helps to ensure compliance. I-9 Remote also provides the convenience of allowing the Form I-9 to be completed via smart phone, tablet, or computer.
I-9 Remote is the most flexible software for authorized agents to complete Section 2. These options include:
Access to a national network of 14,000 mobile notaries trained on completing Form I-9 Access to a network of authorized I-9 agents at national brick and mortar locations Vetting and screening tools for employee or employer chosen agents "Our complete suite of Form I-9 and E-Verify solutions continues to evolve as we strive for excellence in providing easy-to-use solutions that comply with the requirements for employment eligibility and verification. We've listened to the needs of our clients, and we are very excited about revealing the enhancements, which will continue to help companies across the U.S. to avoid crippling fines from a Form I-9 audit ," stated Joseph Impastato II , CEO of I-9 Advantage.
I-9 Medic and I-9 Remote accompany I-9 Advantage™, a web-based Form I-9 and E-Verify solution for digitally creating, managing, and securely storing new Form I-9s.
To learn more about I-9 Advantage's complete suite of Form I-9 & E-Verify solutions visit I-9 Advantage at booth 1301 during the HR Technology Conference & Expo, or click here to schedule a demo.
About I-9 Advantage
Founded by technical innovators and experts in immigration law, I-9 Advantage is the leading provider of cloud-based automated Form I-9 and E-Verify® management software. Unlike many electronic Form I-9 providers, I-9 Advantage continually updates its solutions to reflect ever-changing government compliance requirements, and enhancements for improved user experience. Over 2,300 clients and partners trust I-9 Advantage for their compliance needs. Contact I-9 Advantage to learn more about automated web-based Form I-9 & E-Verify solutions by visiting i9advantage.com, or calling (800) 724-8546.
